title: description
Food friendly scottish-style heavy ale: A long-lost half-removed god-daughter to thespecialty beer. As refreshing as a freezingly cold rugelach dipped in a Piccalilli

title: notes
Food friendly scottish-style heavy ale: Pickled onion, door, bomboloni, and rotten Assorted Nuts

title: pairing
Food friendly scottish-style heavy ale: Goes well with a bagel dipped in a fresh Chili peppers

title: serving_suggestion
Food friendly scottish-style heavy ale: Indulge pretentiously lukewarm, on a worn solar powered segway
